xxl.cursors
Interface Sorter

All Known Implementing Classes:
MergeSorter
public interface Sorter
extends Cursor

Represents the logical sort-operator (marker interface).
Every physical sort-operation has to implement this interface.

An example is given by MergeSorter.

See Also:
Cursor, MergeSorter

Methods inherited from interface xxl.cursors.Cursor
close, hasNext, next, peek, remove, reset, supportsPeek, update
